replies.body:
2 quick questions:

1. If 1st place picks the RP, does the option of the tablet defer to 2nd place? By extension, can the person in 1st place just say to offer their prize to 2nd place, bumping 2nd's prize to 3rd, and 3rd's to 4th?

2. Can I submit a blank picture and say it's Popstar Teemo in stealth?

Thanklez ❤ 
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}

Hey LRIG Tama (also yesssss wixoss)!

1) Yes, that's correct! If the first place winner chooses not to take the tablet, we'll offer it to 2nd, then on to 3rd, 4th, etc. until we find someone who'll enjoy that physical prize!

2) You can certainly try! We do like to see art displaying recognisable champions, though, and if it's stealth - how will we know whether you've drawn Teemo or Twitch or Evelynn??
So in theory, if I came 2 millionth and 1,999,999 people declined I get the tablet? {{sticker:sg-ezreal}}
In theory :P
XDDD{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
{{sticker:sg-ezreal}} It's MS Paint time, fellas.
Can we use any art medium? Or does it have to be digital art since it's sponsored by Wacom?
It can be any medium, just has to depict at least one recognisable League of Legends champion in some form of musical skin (be it existing or designed by you).
You say champion, but the rules say character... Does that mean I can do a KDA Shopkeeper, KDA Minion, Pentakill Ruined King, or Popstar Yone?
There's some wiggleroom there (not intentionally, but it's there!). If you can make a compelling and recognisable KDA Shopkeeper - go for it. ;)

In the first para it says:

>For this contest we want you to depict League champions in their own musical universe.

But then in the rules it says character. Given that the vast majority of recognisable characters in LoL are champions, it may have just been a misnomer or it may be to intentionally open it up a bit. I'll pass that one onto Achenar.
When does voting actually open? :o I think entries are closed now.
I don't believe it's community voted this time, I'm pretty sure this one is internally judged.

Oooh. Awesome!

Thanks for your reply :D

Hello! Just sharing a link to the dev work I put in for my submission **Mariachi Bard** > **https://mariachibard.tumblr.com/**
Thank you for your time
-Kez
Omg it does look awesome!! Good luck man :D
that looks awesome! Good luck with the contest :)

If you do not come 1st 2nd or 3rd will you still be able to see what place you come?
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

Hi, I've submitted my work. Is there anyway to know if it has been submitted successfully (because I did work hard on this one haha, so just want to make sure it went through the submission)? I did got a link after I submitted, but if i click on it, it shows up the same page as the submission page though. sorry about the over worried {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
I second this? I really can't tell if my (our) submission(s) has gone through or not, and it's worrying me a lot lol
Hey guys, if you see the confirmation page that says 'We've received your entry!' then you're all set. :) I've just doublechecked and we've definitely got both your entries.
Alright, thank you for the information!

Okay, so..
If I wanted to design my own skin for a champion BUT they already have a musical skin (eg Ahri) would I still be able to do this? Or do I need to choose a new champion for this?
You can do that :)

1. do we have to put our username on our work?
2. Does it have to be someone in K/DA or any champions?

No, but if you want to sign it either with a summ name or a social media handle (etc.) you are more than welcome too, just no logs etc you don't have the right to use!

I will specifically note that you should *not* put your username on your work whether you choose to sign it or not, as your username is half (if the less secure half) of your account login, and should be kept just to yourself.

You can use any champion (or as mentioned in another comment, recognisable character), and it doesn't have to be K/DA specifically. To simplify your work must include *at least* one recognisable character from the game, in some sort of musical skin universe (existing or made up by you) context.

Question, would photoshopping or digital art created using other pictures or reference be consider? For example, photoshopping multiple different objects from stock photos and some drawing to blend into a single picture.
I think that would depend heavily on what percentage of the works you were using. If you used 1% of a 100 different pictures that would probably be fine, 30% of 3 may well not be.
I see, so heavy editing of a self taken photo wouldn't really count would it?

Hmmm. I'm not sure on that one. If you took the photo yourself, and used other self taken photos and your own drawings for the composite, it may well be allowed given that photography is still art and it would still be your work. I'll pass this one onto Achenar though :)

Sorry for the late reply on this! So yes, a photo manip would be fine as long as they are your own photos or artworks. :) We don't want to restrict your creativity but do want to be sure that your submission is entirely your own work!
Can animations be submitted as art??
Hey Psychotique, animations are fine as long as they're an image format. So a GIF for example is fine - however not an animation submitted in a video/flash/etc. format. Hope this helps to clarify!
Again: is this only for OCE players or can anyone participate? {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

If I draw it completely from scratch, am I allowed to recreate existing pictures already ? (I'm one of those lame people who can look at things and recreate it 'okay' but if you ask me to draw something from my imagination I may aswell blend a minion and submit that).
It has to be your own art. While you're welcome to art a skin that already exists, for example Popstar Ahri, you can't just recreate the splash art, it has to be an original work.
RP is only for 2nd, 3rd, and if they choose it 1st place.

Hi Riot:

I was unable to submit my file as your upload provider wouldn't allow either video format or a file of that size (unsure as to which). I have submitted a word document providing the youtube URL and I hope that that will be acceptable. Please contact me if there is any other way I can get my submission to you.
Submission here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dx2I_t74n2w

Hey Lord Danish, thanks for sending this through. Unfortunately the reason that the platform wouldn't accept a video is because this was intended to be strictly a fanart contest accepting image files only. Your piece is fantastic and I'd love to include it but it wouldn't be fair to other entries that were strictly in image formats.

If you can shoot me a link for a static image of your art, I'm happy to add it as a submission for the panel to consider.

> [{quoted}](name=Achenar,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=cKJZ4NFz,comment-id=00340000,timestamp=2018-11-26T07:27:10.582+0000)
>
> Hey Lord Danish, thanks for sending this through. Unfortunately the reason that the platform wouldn't accept a video is because this was intended to be strictly a fanart contest accepting image files only. Your piece is fantastic and I'd love to include it but it wouldn't be fair to other entries that were strictly in image formats.
> 
> If you can shoot me a link for a static image of your art, I'm happy to add it as a submission for the panel to consider.

Hi Archenar,

Look - happy to send you an image, but obviously my strengths lie in music moreso than drawing. The issue I have is that not only do the competition rules not explicitly state that video format wasn't allowed, they go so far as to say this:

_"or any musical accompaniment** you do not have the right to use**: we don't want Gragas, Esq. writing us any cease and desist letters!"_

By extension, this implies one can submit musical accompaniment that they DO have the right to use, such as something they composed themselves.

I would further argue then, if my interpretation of that comment is a reasonable one, that it isn't unfair to other entries as many could have interpreted that as allowing music which, of course, cannot be included in an image file.

Can you please verify whether or not my entry explicitly contravenes the rules before I submit an image solely? I understand that it was "intended to be strictly a fanart contest accepting image files only" but nowhere does it state that.

P.s: It took substantial effort to compose the music as well so it would be extremely disappointing for it to be excluded.

You're absolutely correct that the rules don't specify that video formats aren't allowed, and this is definitely an area in which we can be much more specific in future. However the description of the contest refers only to art and visuals, and the submission form specifically requested an image upload; additionally other players in the comments did ask about video formats and a specific response was provided:

'Animations are fine as long as they're an image format. So a GIF for example is fine - however not an animation submitted in a video/flash/etc. format. Hope this helps to clarify!'

We have run multimedia, video and music contests in the past and in these cases the mediums allowed have been specifically highlighted in the description of the contest.

I'm really sorry about this because I appreciate you put a ton of effort into your composition and the resulting piece is fantastic, but the musical component is not within the scope of this contest. I'll make sure that we're much more specific in our descriptions in future.

I'm so confused. I just drew a picture of K/DA Ahri, and while I'm aware whether someone wins or not will be partially based upon originality, does not choosing a different champion for Ahri's K/DA skin mean my entry's not eligible?

Hey Coccinelle, your entry is totally eligible!

The 'originality' criteria is designed to encourage folk to be as creative as they like - whether it's a new skin design, an unusual medium for their submission, or using an existing skin in a way that's just a bit different. :) Think of it more as 'creativity of concept' rather than 'new skin design'.
I see okay, thank you!
Hiya! Just wondering if my entry went through alright; if there is anything i could change to apply to the rules? Thank you in advance ~
We've got your entry and you're all set, don't worry!
pls extend the event for a couple hours or maybe even a day :(
